#include "../marshallable.h"
#include "service.h"
#include "server.h"

namespace janus {

RaftServiceImpl::RaftServiceImpl(TxLogServer *sched)
    : svr_((RaftServer*)sched) {
	struct timespec curr_time;
	clock_gettime(CLOCK_MONOTONIC_RAW, &curr_time);
	srand(curr_time.tv_nsec);
}


void RaftServiceImpl::HandleRequestVote(const uint64_t& candidate_term,
                                        const uint64_t& candidate_id,
                                        const uint64_t& last_log_index,
                                        const uint64_t& last_log_term,
                                        uint64_t *term,


                                        bool_t *vote_granted,
                                        rrr::DeferredReply* defer) {
  /* Your code here */
  svr_->HandleRequestVote(candidate_term, candidate_id,
                          last_log_index, last_log_term,
                          term, vote_granted);
  defer->reply();
}

void RaftServiceImpl::HandleAppendEntries(const uint64_t& leader_term,
                                          const uint64_t& leader_id,
                                          const uint64_t& prev_log_index,
                                          const uint64_t& prev_log_term,
                                          const vector<RaftLogEntry>& entries,
                                          const uint64_t& leader_commit,
                                          uint64_t *term,
                                          bool_t *success,
                                          rrr::DeferredReply* defer) {
  /* Your code here */


  svr_->HandleAppendEntries(leader_term, leader_id,
                            prev_log_index, prev_log_term,
                            entries,
                            leader_commit,
                            term, success);
  defer->reply();
}

void RaftServiceImpl::HandleHelloRpc(const string& req,
                                     string* res,
                                     rrr::DeferredReply* defer) {
  /* Your code here */
  Log_info("receive an rpc: %s", req.c_str());
  *res = "world";
  defer->reply();
}

} // namespace janus;
